text: ● It is a Drone buying website where users can buy a drone at a minimal price ● User can place their order and make themselves log in via Gmail and be able to create a new account also ● Admin is allowed to make anyone admin of the website ● User can post their review regarding the product ● Fully mobile responsive
name: Droners
tecnology: React Js, Material Ui, React Router, Firebase, Sweet Alert2, React Swiper, React Hook Form, React Reveal, Node, Express, MongoDB, Netlify, Heroku

text: ● It is a Travel Agency website where users can book a famous place at a minimal price.   ● Users can book a tour and make themselves log in via Gmail and be able to create a new account also.   ● Fully mobile responsive
name: Travel World
tecnology: React Js, Material Ui, React Router, Firebase, Sweet Alert2, React Swiper, React Hook Form, React Reveal, Node, Express, MongoDB, Netlify, Heroku

text: ● It is a clinic related website where users can choose many medical services in one place.  ● Users can log in with Gmail and Facebook and allowed to create their account.   ● Users can see the description of a certain service.   ● Fully mobile responsive
name: Care Hospital Ltd.
tecnology: React Js, Bootstrap, React Router, Firebase, React Swiper, React Hook Form, Netlify, Heroku
